original_title: RPWL - God Has Failed: Live & Personal
overview: The publication includes materials that were supposed to be recorded in November 2020 as part of a large-scale anniversary tour for the 20th anniversary of the release of the debut album "God Has Failed", but due to the fault of COVID-19, things turned out differently. RPWL performed all of its hits in the studio, which should also please the band's fans. Mostly proven hits from early work sound, everything is filmed with camera raids on musicians to create the atmosphere of a live concert. In addition, the release includes two live recordings of Pink Floyd's interpretations in the studio in 2000, when the debut album was recorded.
title: RPWL - God Has Failed: Live & Personal
